statements: DELETE FROM unauthorized_access_logs WHERE username = 'admin' AND action = 'login'
DELETE FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE id = 1 AND ip_address = '192.168.1.100';
DELETE FROM trigger_logs WHERE trigger_table = 'unauthorized_access_attempts' AND action_type = 'INSERT';
DELETE FROM UnauthorizedAccessLogs WHERE log_id = 1000 AND timestamp < '2021-09-01';
DELETE FROM AccessAttemptTriggers WHERE trigger_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-06-30 23:59:59';
DELETE FROM user_sessions WHERE username = 'admin' AND start_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Trigger_logs WHERE trigger_id = 100 AND table_name = 'Users';
